title: Die Makromolekulare Chemie
additional-note: This is a European publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. Spot-checks of some issues from the 1980s and 1990s show a US publisher address and US subscription rates.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Shelton Henderson for copyright research on this title.
